name: Xpyryment
description:
12+ drug consume

an prototype of an 3d game

Huge thanks to Lewis Perkins for his 3d engine

CONTROLS: 

W A S D to move arrow keys to look around C to crouch Space to jump

P to open AddOns 

Q to open Spawn Menu

 3 to open Advanced Building

M for controls

R to teleport to spawn

Press Space and V to fly!
